text: Agassiz, British Columbia is a community in the Eastern Fraser Valley, British Columbia that is about east from Vancouver and northeast from City of Chilliwack. It was named after Lewis Nunn Agassiz, which is part of the Agassiz family. Most people in the District of Kent lives in the Agassiz area. ==Related pages== *Harrison Hot Springs Category:Settlements in British Columbia Category:Lower Mainland
title: Agassiz, British Columbia
